version_description:
Join the Christmas celebrations and ring in the new year in Fruit Ninja Free!
NEW EVENT: Merry Christmas! Celebrate with a special event and prizes to be won!
NEW BLADE: Slice up some sweet combos with the Holly Blade!
CHRISTMAS GIFT: We’re playing Santa – get 2000 Starfruit and 100 Golden Apples for free!
NEW TUTORIALS: New to Fruit Ninja? Learn how to play each mode with our new tutorial system!

Join the Christmas celebrations and ring in the new year in Fruit Ninja Free!
NEW EVENT: Merry Christmas! Celebrate with a special event and prizes to be won!
NEW BLADE: Slice up some sweet combos with the Holly Blade!
CHRISTMAS GIFT: We’re playing Santa – get 2000 Starfruit and 100 Golden Apples for free!
NEW TUTORIALS: New to Fruit Ninja? Learn how to play each mode with our new tutorial system!

Gong Xi Fa Cai! The Year of the Rooster is here – celebrate with Fruit Ninja Free’s Chinese New Year update!
EVENT PROGRESS BAR: Fill it up for a big prize and unlock bonuses along the way!
ZODIAC DOJO: The event’s prize will set you up for all the Chinese New Years to come!
RED ENVELOPE GIFT: Good fortune to you – enjoy your gift of 500 Starfruit and 20 Golden Apples!

Gong Xi Fa Cai! The Year of the Rooster is here – celebrate with Fruit Ninja Free’s Chinese New Year update!
EVENT PROGRESS BAR: Fill it up for a big prize and unlock bonuses along the way!
ZODIAC DOJO: The event’s prize will set you up for all the Chinese New Years to come!
RED ENVELOPE GIFT: Good fortune to you – enjoy your gift of 500 Starfruit and 20 Golden Apples!

Love is in the air in the Valentine’s Day update to Fruit Ninja Free!
NEW EVENT GAMEPLAY: Capture the hearts that appear from sliced fruit!
BONDED ROSES BLADE: This new blade unlocks two-fruit combos. Pair ‘em up!
STATIC ELECTRIC LOVE DOJO: Feel the love! Rub the heart in the middle of this new dojo and build it up for a massive combo.
GIFT: Get 20 Gold Apples and 500 Starfruit, with lots of love from us to you!

Love is in the air in the Valentine’s Day update to Fruit Ninja Free!
NEW EVENT GAMEPLAY: Capture the hearts that appear from sliced fruit!
BONDED ROSES BLADE: This new blade unlocks two-fruit combos. Pair ‘em up!
STATIC ELECTRIC LOVE DOJO: Feel the love! Rub the heart in the middle of this new dojo and build it up for a massive combo.
GIFT: Get 20 Gold Apples and 500 Starfruit, with lots of love from us to you!

Happy St Patrick’s Day from the Fruit Ninja team! Is luck on your side? Play the new update to find out!
NEW THEME: Get ready for lots of green, gold and a dressed-up Sensei!
NEW EVENT: Slice combos to create Lucky Clovers, then drag them into the Bag of Charms to collect them!
NEW BLADE: Your prize for completing the event? The Shamrock Blade! Cut fruit for the chance to shoot clover leaves in a random direction and score a bonus!

Happy St Patrick’s Day from the Fruit Ninja team! Is luck on your side? Play the new update to find out!
NEW THEME: Get ready for lots of green, gold and a dressed-up Sensei!
NEW EVENT: Slice combos to create Lucky Clovers, then drag them into the Bag of Charms to collect them!
NEW BLADE: Your prize for completing the event? The Shamrock Blade! Cut fruit for the chance to shoot clover leaves in a random direction and score a bonus!

Happy Easter, Ninjas! Celebrate with the tasty new update to Fruit Ninja!
NEW EVENT: Slice the falling eggs for bonus tokens in our limited time event and exchange them for prizes in the Event Store!
NEW BLADE: Turn fruit into works of art with the new Fruit Decorator Blade, then slice them for bonus points!
EASTER EGG: An Easter treat awaits you! Hop over to the in-game store and get 500 Starfruit and 20 Gold Apples!

Happy Easter, Ninjas! Celebrate with the tasty new update to Fruit Ninja!
NEW EVENT: Slice the falling eggs for bonus tokens in our limited time event and exchange them for prizes in the Event Store!
NEW BLADE: Turn fruit into works of art with the new Fruit Decorator Blade, then slice them for bonus points!
EASTER EGG: An Easter treat awaits you! Hop over to the in-game store and get 500 Starfruit and 20 Gold Apples!

Get ready for fruit-slicing mayhem as the characters from our new YouTube series, Fruit Ninja: Frenzy Force, do battle with the old ninjas!
NEW OPPONENTS: Play as Nobu, Mari, Han and Katsuro and clash with Ralph, Niya, Peng and Seb in Challenge Mode. Who will be victorious?
GAME TWEAKS: We’ve rebalanced Challenge Mode to address feedback about the difficulty. Happy slicing!
WATCH FRENZY FORCE: We’ve included a link to the first episode so you can watch it for free!

Get ready for fruit-slicing mayhem as the characters from our new YouTube series, Fruit Ninja: Frenzy Force, do battle with the old ninjas!
NEW OPPONENTS: Play as Nobu, Mari, Han and Katsuro and clash with Ralph, Niya, Peng and Seb in Challenge Mode. Who will be victorious?
GAME TWEAKS: We’ve rebalanced Challenge Mode to address feedback about the difficulty. Happy slicing!
WATCH FRENZY FORCE: We’ve included a link to the first episode so you can watch it for free!
本次更新包括修复一些bug和做出少许改进。欢迎您一如以往地向我们反馈宝贵意见。
本次更新包括修复一些bug和做出少许改进。欢迎您一如以往地向我们反馈宝贵意见。
This update includes a number of bug fixes and minor improvements. As always, keep the feedback coming!
This update includes a number of bug fixes and minor improvements. As always, keep the feedback coming!

The holidays are over for now, but there’s still lots to enjoy in Fruit Ninja!

UPDATED EVENT: Slice the crates for a random power that affects fruit (and possibly your score)!
NEW BLADE: Slice the pomegranate for longer with the Ancient Yoyo Blade!
NEW DOJO: Have some fun in the sun with the Sunlight Dojo!

As always, keep the feedback coming and happy slicing!

HOLLY BLADE: Jingle all the way to a high score with the Holly Blade!
A GIFT FROM US: We’re playing Santa – get 2000 Starfruit and 100 Golden Apples as a present from us!

FRUIT NINJA 10TH ANNIVERSARY UPDATE
To celebrate hitting this huge milestone, we've completely rebuilt the game from the ground up! It's the same Fruit Ninja you know and love, but with gorgeous new visuals and tech! Slice fruit like never before in glorious high definition!
With this remake, we also have big plans for future updates that just weren't possible before. Stay tuned!

-----------------------------------------

Play the game that started it all! The iconic fruit slicing adventure that set the benchmark for all mobile games is fresher, juicier, and sharper than ever! Ready your blade, ninja.
Travel the land of Fruitasia, making friends, beating rivals, and building out your collection of rare and powerful blades. The road to becoming a master ninja will be full of challenge and wonder, but fear not, for Sensei has some sage advice:
"Remember ninja, to achieve true mastery, you must be one with the fruit."
Don't know what that means? Neither do we! But one thing we all know for sure is how awesome Fruit Ninja is!

Features
- The most satisfying gameplay built for mobile: juicy fruit slicing action!
- Feast your eyes on Fruit Ninja's new and improved graphics!
- Collect an arsenal of blades with unique visuals and powers!
- Numerous modes with major twists on the gameplay to keep things fresher than your local farmer's market!
- Change up the action by going to different dojos and empowering your slicing score!
- Compete in leaderboards with friends and other players around the world!
- Meet the colourful characters of Fruitasia and adventure together through a strange and beautiful land!

So what are you waiting for? Sensei is ready to take on new students to celebrate a whole decade of Fruit Ninja!

Ho-Ho-Ho Fruit Ninjas! Festive powers have arrived for the holidays!

New Candy Cane Blade with power!
For a limited time get your FREE Candy Cane blade from the shop now! Level it up to unlock a brand new power...can you hear those sleigh bells?

Improved Festive Powers - The Holly Blade!
Speaking of sleigh bells, we've remade a special bell just for the Holly Blade, slice the new and improved Holly Blade bell with fruit for an extra bonus!

12 Days of Gifts and Discounts!
Don't have the Holly Blade? Well for some extra holiday cheer there's 12 days of holiday rewards and sales available where you can grab it at a discount along with other free rewards! Be sure to come in every day or you'll miss out!

Good things come in twos! Local multiplayer is back! Grab a friend and go head-2-head to find out who is number one! And who is number two!

Two powers return to Fruit Ninja! Find and wield the powers of the Northern Lights and Laser Blades!

Update 3.2.0 is out!


Unleash the Dragon!
Slice your way through this event to earn a King Dragon Blade!


Unlock the King Dragon blade Power!
Earn duplicates in the event to reach level 10, and find the King Dragon power in boxes.


Earn more Rewards!
For skilled Fruit Ninjas more awards await in this event!
